entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.6°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
